lingpy.compare.borrowing.trebor.TreBor.plot_MLN

TreBor.plot_MLN(glm, verbose=False, filename='pdf', threshold=1, fileformat='pdf', usetex=True, colormap=None, taxon_labels='taxon.short_labels', **keywords)

Plot the MLN with help of Matplotlib.
